response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a fair deal. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $11,000? This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to its full value. I believe this opportunity won't last long, so please let me know your decision soon.", "product_price": 11000}
